title: Does the Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) support 5G networks?
content:
Apple finally introduced the iPad Air 5 (2022) during its Peek Performance virtual event. This tablet comes with boosted internals, despite it having the chassis of the previous-gen model. These include Apple’s M1 chip and 8GB of RAM. It also comes in five vibrant finishes to choose from — Space Gray, Starlight, Pink, Purple, and

The post Does the Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) support 5G networks? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple revealed the iPad Air 5 (2022) during its Peek Performance event. Here's what you need to know about its 5G network support.
